title: Queen's jubilee £3m fund to help English village halls
description: The government hopes the repairs fund will help create a jubilee legacy for villages in England.

title: How Danny Boyle brought the Sex Pistols to life

title: Siblings reunited 75 years after India Partition
description: The family in Punjab found out about their sister in Pakistan two years ago and finally met her last month.

title: Somerset couple live their 1930s dream lifestyle

title: The man turning mud into eco-friendly 'concrete'

description: Rail worker Belly Mujinga became ill after allegedly being coughed on and spat at by a passenger.
